Title: When the application is launched for the first time, it requests permission to send push notifications

Steps.1: Install the application on a mobile device
Steps.3: Check for a message requesting permission to send push notifications in the application

Expected result: When the application is launched for the first time, it requests permission to send push notifications

Expected result.Title: Validation of the Hours field: Checking system acceptance of the number 0 and automatic addition of 0 before the number

Steps.2: Enter the value 0 in the Hours field

Expected result.Expected result: The value is accepted by the system without errors, and 0 is automatically added before the number

Expected result.Title: Successful authorization

Preconditions.1: Registration in the system is completed, a valid login (engelskeLetter) and password (ktokto17) are obtained
Preconditions.2: The user is not authorized in the system
Preconditions.3: The authorization page of the system is open

Steps.1: Enter the login from the precondition into the Username field
Steps.2: Enter the password from the precondition into the Password field

Expected result.Expected result: Successful authorization occurs, and the page for adding a new cat opens
